attributes.action: give more people in need more support
attributes.additional_details: because many people are struggling and have to chose between household  bills and food on the table for weeks because of how much bills have come to. And because they don't have the support or find their local food help accessible enough they go hungry
attributes.background:
make more food vouchers and food banks for accessible 
make food banks compulsory in schools

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
